ModMetaData.name: [LVI] - Face and Body
ModMetaData.author: aaa
ModMetaData.description:
该mod是MIS - 明日方舟mod的附属，用来解决干员头发突出脸部和体型问题的问题，该mod并非必须，如果你可以忍受脸部轻微突出，和轻微的肢体突出，您仍然可以使用自己心仪的脸部美化和身体美化
This is submod of MIS Arknight, aimed to solve the bulge of vanilla body with some Operators' hair and body. However, this is not a hard requirement. You can freely use this mod or the main mod independently.
